p:
Starting with SHEO175-0.5, some components volatilized completely (α-phellandrene, limonene), while more thermal resistant components began to increase. In the case of SHEO175-2.5, the changes are greater, more components volatilized (sabinene, cis-sabinene hydrate) while previously detected components are now quantified (cis-α-bisabolene and caryophyllene oxide). For SHEO190-2.5 only stable thermal components remained: p-cymene (C 10H 14, b.p. 177 ºC), carvacrol (C 10H 14O, b.p. 237.7 ºC), caryophyllene (C 15H 24, b.p. 262–264 ºC) and β-bisabolene, (C 15H 24, b.p. 275 ºC)
26 while all others were evaporated.
